   19: %%
   20: -module(erl_lint_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: %%-define(debug, true).
   23: 
   24: -ifdef(debug).
   25: -define(line, put(line, ?LINE), ).
   26: -define(config(X,Y), foo).
   27: -define(datadir, "erl_lint_SUITE_data").
   28: -define(privdir, "erl_lint_SUITE_priv").
   29: -define(t, test_server).
   30: -else.
   31: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   32: -define(datadir, proplists:get_value(data_dir, Conf)).
   33: -define(privdir, proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Conf)).
   34: -endif.
   35: 
   36: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0]).
   37: 
   38: -export([singleton_type_var_errors/1,
   39:          documentation_attributes/1,
   40:          unused_vars_warn_basic/1,
   41:          unused_vars_warn_lc/1,
   42:          unused_vars_warn_rec/1,
   43:          unused_vars_warn_fun/1,
   44:          unused_vars_OTP_4858/1,
   45:          unused_unsafe_vars_warn/1,
   46:          export_vars_warn/1,
   47:          shadow_vars/1,
   48:          unused_import/1,
   49:          unused_function/1,
   50:          unsafe_vars/1,unsafe_vars2/1,
   51:          unsafe_vars_try/1,
   52:          unsized_binary_in_bin_gen_pattern/1,
   53:          guard/1, otp_4886/1, otp_4988/1, otp_5091/1, otp_5276/1, otp_5338/1,
   54:          otp_5362/1, otp_5371/1, otp_7227/1, binary_aliases/1,
   55:          otp_5494/1, otp_5644/1, otp_5878/1,
   56:          otp_5917/1, otp_6585/1, otp_6885/1, otp_10436/1, otp_11254/1,
   57:          otp_11772/1, otp_11771/1, otp_11872/1,
   58:          export_all/1,
   59:          bif_clash/1,
   60:          behaviour_basic/1, behaviour_multiple/1, otp_11861/1,
   61:          otp_7550/1,
   62:          otp_8051/1,
   63:          format_warn/1,
   64:          on_load_successful/1, on_load_failing/1,
   65:          too_many_arguments/1,
   66:          basic_errors/1,bin_syntax_errors/1,
   67:          predef/1,
   68:          maps/1,maps_type/1,maps_parallel_match/1,
   69:          otp_11851/1,otp_11879/1,otp_13230/1,
   70:          record_errors/1, otp_11879_cont/1,
   71:          non_latin1_module/1, illegal_module_name/1, otp_14323/1,
   72:          stacktrace_syntax/1,
   73:          otp_14285/1, otp_14378/1,
   74:          external_funs/1,otp_15456/1,otp_15563/1,
   75:          unused_type/1,binary_types/1,removed/1, otp_16516/1,
   76:          inline_nifs/1,
   77:          undefined_nifs/1,
   78:          no_load_nif/1,
   79:          warn_missing_spec/1,
   80:          otp_16824/1,
   81:          underscore_match/1,
   82:          unused_record/1,
   83:          unused_type2/1,
   84:          eep49/1,
   85:          redefined_builtin_type/1,
   86:          tilde_k/1,
   87:          match_float_zero/1,
   88:          undefined_module/1,
   89:          update_literal/1,
   90:          messages_with_jaro_suggestions/1,
   91:          illegal_zip_generator/1]).
   92: 
   93: suite() ->
   94:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   95:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   96: 
   97: all() -> 
   98:     [{group, unused_vars_warn}, export_vars_warn,
   99:      shadow_vars, unused_import, unused_function,
  100:      unsafe_vars, unsafe_vars2, unsafe_vars_try, guard,
  101:      unsized_binary_in_bin_gen_pattern,
  102:      otp_4886, otp_4988, otp_5091, otp_5276, otp_5338,
  103:      otp_5362, otp_5371, otp_7227, binary_aliases, otp_5494, otp_5644,
  104:      otp_5878, otp_5917, otp_6585, otp_6885, otp_10436, otp_11254,
  105:      otp_11772, otp_11771, otp_11872, export_all,
  106:      bif_clash, behaviour_basic, behaviour_multiple, otp_11861,
  107:      otp_7550, otp_8051, format_warn, {group, on_load},
  108:      too_many_arguments, basic_errors, bin_syntax_errors, predef,
  109:      maps, maps_type, maps_parallel_match,
  110:      otp_11851, otp_11879, otp_13230,
  111:      record_errors, otp_11879_cont,
  112:      non_latin1_module, illegal_module_name, otp_14323,
  113:      stacktrace_syntax, otp_14285, otp_14378, external_funs,
  114:      otp_15456, otp_15563, unused_type, binary_types, removed, otp_16516,
  115:      undefined_nifs,
  116:      no_load_nif,
  117:      inline_nifs, warn_missing_spec, otp_16824,
  118:      underscore_match, unused_record, unused_type2,
  119:      eep49,
  120:      redefined_builtin_type,
  121:      tilde_k,
  122:      singleton_type_var_errors,
  123:      documentation_attributes,
  124:      match_float_zero,
  125:      undefined_module,
  126:      update_literal,
  127:      messages_with_jaro_suggestions,
  128:      illegal_zip_generator].
  129: 
  130: groups() -> 
  131:     [{unused_vars_warn, [],
  132:       [unused_vars_warn_basic, unused_vars_warn_lc,
  133:        unused_vars_warn_rec, unused_vars_warn_fun,
  134:        unused_vars_OTP_4858, unused_unsafe_vars_warn]},
  135:      {on_load, [], [on_load_successful, on_load_failing]}].
  136: 
  137: 
  138: %% Warnings for unused variables in some simple cases.
  139: unused_vars_warn_basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  140:     Ts = [{basic1,
  141:            <<"f(F) -> % F unused.
  142:                 ok.
  143: 
  144: f(F, F) ->
  145:     ok.
  146: 
  147: g(_X) ->
  148:     y.
  149: 
  150: h(P) ->
  151:     P.
  152: 
  153: x(N) ->
  154:     case a:b() of
  155: 	[N|Y] -> % Y unused.
  156: 	    ok
  157:     end.
  158: 
  159: y(N, L) ->
  160:     lists:map(fun(T) -> T*N end, L).
  161: 
  162: z(N, L) -> % N unused
  163:     lists:map(fun(N, T) -> T*N end, L).  % N shadowed.
  164: 
  165: 
  166: c(A) ->
  167:     case A of
  168: 	1 -> B = []; % B unused.
  169: 	2 -> B = []; % B unused.
  170: 	3 -> B = f, B
  171:     end.
  172: ">>,
  173: 	   [warn_unused_vars],
  174: {warnings,[{{1,23},erl_lint,{unused_var,'F'}},
  175: 	   {{15,5},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  176: 	   {{22,3},erl_lint,{unused_var,'N'}},
  177: 	   {{23,19},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'N','fun'}},
  178: 	   {{28,7},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}},
  179: 	   {{29,7},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}}]}},
  180:           {basic2,
  181:            <<"-record(r, {x,y}).
  182:               f({X,Y}) -> {Z=X,Z=Y};
  183:               f([H|T]) -> [Z=H|Z=T];
  184:               f(#r{x=X,y=Y}) -> #r{x=A=X,y=A=Y}.
  185:               g({M, F}) -> (Z=M):(Z=F)();
  186:               g({M, F, Arg}) -> (Z=M):F(Z=Arg).
  187:               h(X, Y) -> (Z=X) + (Z=Y).">>,
  188:            [warn_unused_vars], []},
  189:           {basic3,
  190:            <<"f(E) ->
  191:                   X = Y = E.">>,
  192:            [warn_unused_vars],
  193:            {warnings,[{{2,19},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  194:                       {{2,23},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}}]}}],
  195:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
  196:     ok.
  197: 
  198: %% Warnings for unused variables in list comprehensions.
  199: unused_vars_warn_lc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  200:     Ts = [{lc1, 
  201:            <<"bin([X]) ->
  202:                   [A || <<A:X>> <- []]; % X used, not shadowed.
  203:               bin({X}) ->
  204:                   [X || <<X:X>> <- []]; % X used, and shadowed.
  205:               bin({X,Y,Z}) ->
  206:                   [{A,B} || <<A:X>> <- Z, <<B:Y>> <- Z];
  207:               bin([X,Y,Z]) -> % Y unused.
  208:                   [C || <<V:X>> <- Z, <<B:V>> <- Z, <<C:B>> <- Z].
  209:            ">>, 
  210:            [warn_unused_vars],
  211:            {warnings, [{{4,27},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'X',generate}},
  212:                        {{7,22},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}}]}},
  213: 
  214:           {lc2,
  215:            <<"bin([X]) ->
  216:                   [A || <<A:X>> <- []]; % X used, not shadowed.
  217:               bin({X}) ->
  218:                   [X || <<X:X>> <- []]; % X used, and shadowed.
  219:               bin({X,Y,Z}) ->
  220:                   [{A,B} || <<A:X>> <- Z, <<B:Y>> <- Z];
  221:               bin([X,Y,Z]) -> % Y unused.
  222:                   [C || <<V:X>> <- Z, <<B:V>> <- Z, <<C:B>> <- Z].
  223:            ">>,
  224:            [warn_unused_vars],
  225:            {warnings,[{{4,27},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'X',generate}},
  226:                       {{7,22},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}}]}},
  227: 
  228:           {lc3,
  229:            <<"a([A]) ->
  230:                   B = foo,
  231:                   [{C,B} || {C,_} <- A];
  232:               a({A}) ->
  233:                   B = foo,
  234:                   [C || {C,_} <- [B,A]];
  235:               a({A,A}) ->
  236:                   B = foo,
  237:                   [C || {C,_} <- B, B < A].
  238:            ">>,
  239:            [warn_unused_vars],
  240:            []},
  241: 
  242:           {lc4,
  243:            <<"b(A) ->
  244:                   B = foo, % B unused.
  245:                   [C || {C,_} <- A].
  246:            ">>,
  247:            [warn_unused_vars],
  248:            {warnings,[{{2,19},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}}]}},
  249: 
  250:           {lc5,
  251:            <<"c(A) ->
  252:                   B = foo,
  253:                   [C || {C,_} <- A],
  254:                   B.
  255:            ">>,
  256:            [warn_unused_vars],
  257:            []},
  258: 
  259:           {lc6,
  260:            <<"d(A) ->
  261:                   B = foo,
  262:                   [{A,B} || {Id,_} <- A]. % Id unused.
  263:            ">>,
  264:            [warn_unused_vars],
  265:            {warnings,[{{3,30},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Id'}}]}},
  266: 
  267:           {lc7,
  268:            <<"e(A) ->
  269:                   B = foo, % B unused.
  270:                   [B || B <- A]. % B shadowed.
  271:            ">>,
  272:            [warn_unused_vars],
  273:            {warnings,[{{2,19},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}},
  274:                       {{3,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'B',generate}}]}},
  275: 
  276:           {lc8,
  277:            <<"f(A) ->
  278:                   B = foo,
  279:                   [B || B <- A], % B shadowed.
  280:                   B.
  281:            ">>,
  282:            [warn_unused_vars],
  283:            {warnings,[{{3,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'B',generate}}]}},
  284: 
  285:           {lc9,
  286:            <<"g(A) ->
  287:                   B = foo, % B unused.
  288:                   [A || B <- A]. % B shadowed, B unused.
  289:            ">>,
  290:            [warn_unused_vars],
  291:            {warnings,[{{2,19},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}},
  292:                       {{3,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}},
  293:                       {{3,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'B',generate}}]}},
  294: 
  295:           {lc10,
  296:            <<"h(A) ->
  297:                   B = foo,
  298:                   [A || B <- A], % B shadowed, B unused.
  299:                   B.
  300:            ">>,
  301:            [warn_unused_vars],
  302:            {warnings,[{{3,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}},
  303:                       {{3,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'B',generate}}]}},
  304: 
  305:           {lc11,
  306:            <<"i(X) ->
  307:                   [Z || Z <- X, % Z unused.
  308:                         Z = X <- [foo]]. % X and Z shadowed. X unused!
  309:            ">>,
  310:            [warn_unused_vars],
  311:            {warnings,[{{2,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Z'}},
  312:                       {{3,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'Z',generate}},
  313:                       {{3,29},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  314:                       {{3,29},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'X',generate}}]}},
  315: 
  316:           {lc12,
  317:            <<"j({X}) ->
  318:                   [Z || Z <- X, % Z unused.
  319:                         Z <- X = [[1,2,3]], % Z shadowed. Z unused.
  320:                         Z <- X, % Z shadowed. Z unused.
  321:                         Z <- X]; % Z shadowed.
  322:               j(X) ->
  323:                   [foo || X <- X, % X shadowed.
  324:                         X <-    % X shadowed. X unused.
  325:                              X =
  326:                                  Y = [[1,2,3]], % Y unused.
  327:                         X <- [], % X shadowed.
  328:                         X <- X]. % X shadowed. X unused.
  329:            ">>,
  330:            [warn_unused_vars],
  331:            {warnings,[{{2,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Z'}},
  332:                       {{3,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Z'}},
  333:                       {{3,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'Z',generate}},
  334:                       {{4,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Z'}},
  335:                       {{4,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'Z',generate}},
  336:                       {{5,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'Z',generate}},
  337:                       {{7,27},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'X',generate}},
  338:                       {{8,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  339:                       {{8,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'X',generate}},
  340:                       {{10,34},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  341:                       {{11,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'X',generate}},
  342:                       {{12,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  343:                       {{12,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'X',generate}}]}},
  344: 
  345:           {lc13,
  346:            <<"k(X) ->
  347:                   [Z || Z <- Y = X]; % Y unused.
  348:               k(X) ->
  349:                   [Z || Z <- X = Y = X]; % Y unused!
  350:               k(X) ->
  351:                   [Z || Z <- begin X = Y = X, Y end];
  352:               k(X) ->
  353:                   [{Y,W} || W <- Y = X]; % Y unbound
  354:               k(X) ->
  355:                   [Z || Z <- (Y = X), % Y unused.
  356:                        Y > X]; % Y unbound.
  357:               k(X) ->
  358:                   [Y || Y = X > 3, Z = X]; % Z unused.
  359:               k(X) ->
  360:                   [Z || Y = X > 3, Z = X]. % Y unused.
  361:            ">>,
  362:            [warn_unused_vars],
  363:            {error,[{{8,21},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'Y'}},
  364:                    {{11,24},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'Y'}}],
  365:                   [{{2,30},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  366:                    {{4,34},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  367:                    {{8,34},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  368:                    {{10,31},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  369:                    {{13,36},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Z'}},
  370:                    {{15,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}}]}},
  371: 
  372:           {lc14,
  373:            <<"lc2() ->
  374:                   Z = [[1],[2],[3]], 
  375:                   [X || Z <- Z, % Z shadowed.
  376:                         X <- Z].
  377:            ">>,
  378:            [warn_unused_vars],
  379:            {warnings,[{{3,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'Z',generate}}]}},
  380: 
  381:           {lc15,
  382:            <<"lc3() ->
  383:                   Z = [1,2,3], 
  384:                   [X || X <- Z, 
  385:                         Z <- Z]. % Z shadowed. Z unused.
  386:            ">>,
  387:            [warn_unused_vars],
  388:            {warnings,[{{4,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Z'}},
  389:                       {{4,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'Z',generate}}]}},
  390: 
  391:           {lc16,
  392:            <<"bin(Z) ->
  393:                   case bar of
  394:                       true ->
  395:                           U = 2;
  396:                       false ->
  397:                           true
  398:                   end,
  399:                   case bar of
  400:                       true ->
  401:                           X = 2;
  402:                       false ->
  403:                           X = 3
  404:                   end,
  405:                   case foo of
  406:                       true ->
  407:                           Y = 3; % Y unused.
  408:                       false ->
  409:                           4
  410:                   end,
  411:                   case foo of
  412:                       1 ->
  413:                           U; % U unsafe.
  414:                       2 ->
  415:                           [Z || <<U:X>> <- Z]; % (X exported.) U unused.
  416:                       3 ->
  417:                           [Z || <<U:X>> <- Z], % (X exported.) U unused.
  418:                           U % U unsafe.
  419:                   end.
  420:            ">>,
  421:            [warn_unused_vars],
  422:            {error,[{{22,27},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'U',{'case',{2,19}}}},
  423:                    {{27,27},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'U',{'case',{2,19}}}}],
  424:             [{{16,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  425:              {{24,35},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}},
  426:              {{26,35},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}}]}},
  427: 
  428:           {lc17,
  429:            <<"bin(Z) ->
  430:                   %% This used to pass erl_lint...
  431:                   case bar of
  432:                       true ->
  433:                           U = 2;
  434:                       false ->
  435:                           true
  436:                   end,
  437:                   case bar of
  438:                       true ->
  439:                           X = 2;
  440:                       false ->
  441:                           X = 3
  442:                   end,
  443:                   case foo of
  444:                       true ->
  445:                           Y = 3; % Y unused.
  446:                       false ->
  447:                           4
  448:                   end,
  449:                   [Z || <<U:X>> <- Z], % (X exported.) U unused.
  450:                   U. % U unsafe.
  451:            ">>,
  452:            [warn_unused_vars],
  453:            {error,[{{22,19},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'U',{'case',{3,19}}}}],
  454:             [{{17,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  455:              {{21,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}}]}},
  456: 
  457:           {lc18,
  458:            <<"bin(Z) ->
  459:                   case bar of
  460:                       true ->
  461:                           U = 2;
  462:                       false ->
  463:                           true
  464:                   end,
  465:                   case bar of
  466:                       true ->
  467:                           X = 2;
  468:                       false ->
  469:                           X = 3
  470:                   end,
  471:                   case foo of
  472:                       true ->
  473:                           Y = 3;
  474:                       false ->
  475:                           4
  476:                   end,
  477:                   [B || <<U: % U unused
  478:                           U>> <- X, <<B:Y>> <- Z]. % U unsafe. Y unsafe. 
  479: 						% U shadowed. (X exported.)
  480:            ">>,
  481:            [warn_unused_vars],
  482:            {error,[{{21,27},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'U',{'case',{2,19}}}},
  483:                    {{21,41},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'Y',{'case',{14,19}}}}],
  484:             [{{20,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}}
  485:             ]}},
  486: 
  487:           {lc19,
  488:            <<"p({B,C}) ->
  489:                   <<A:B,A:C>> = <<17:32>>;
  490:               p(B) ->
  491:                   <<A:B>> = <<17:32>>. % A unused.
  492:            ">>,
  493:            [warn_unused_vars],
  494:            {warnings,[{{4,21},erl_lint,{unused_var,'A'}}]}},
  495: 
  496:           {lc20,
  497:            <<"c({I1,I2}) ->
  498:                   if
  499:                       <<I1:I2>> == <<>> ->
  500:                           foo
  501:                   end;
  502:               c([C1,C2]) -> % C1 unused.
  503:                   case foo of
  504:                       <<C2:C2,
  505:                         C3:C2>> -> % C3 unused.
  506:                           bar
  507:                   end.
  508: 
  509:            ">>,
  510:            [warn_unused_vars],
  511:            {warnings,[{{6,18},erl_lint,{unused_var,'C1'}},
  512:                       {{7,19},sys_core_fold,{nomatch,no_clause}},
  513:                       {{9,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'C3'}}]}},
  514: 
  515:           {lc21,
  516:            <<"t() ->
  517:                   S = 8,
  518:                   case <<3:8>> of
  519:                       <<X:S>> ->
  520:                           X;
  521:                       <<S:X>> -> % X unbound
  522:                           foo
  523:                   end;
  524:               t() ->
  525:                   S = 8,
  526:                   case <<3:8>> of
  527:                       <<S:S>> ->
  528:                           S;
  529:                       <<Q:32>> -> % Q unused.
  530:                           foo
  531:                   end.
  532:            ">>,
  533:            [warn_unused_vars],
  534:            {error,[{{6,27},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'X'}}],
  535:                   [{{14,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Q'}}]}}
  536: 
  537:           ],
  538:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
  539:     ok.
  540: 
  541: 
  542: %% Warnings for unused variables in records.
  543: unused_vars_warn_rec(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  544:     Ts = [{rec1, % An example provided by Bjorn.
  545:            <<"-record(edge,
  546:                       {ltpr,
  547:                        ltsu,
  548:                        rtpr,
  549:                        rtsu
  550:                       }).
  551: 
  552:               f1(#edge{ltpr = A, ltsu = A}) ->
  553:                   true;
  554:               f1({Q, Q}) ->
  555:                   true.
  556: 
  557:               f2(Edge, Etab) ->
  558:                   case gb_trees:lookup(Edge, Etab) of
  559:                       {value,#edge{ltpr=Same,ltsu=Same}} -> ok;
  560:                       {value,_} -> error
  561:                   end.
  562: 
  563:               bar(Edge, Etab) ->
  564:                   case gb_trees:lookup(Edge, Etab) of
  565:                       {Same,Same} -> ok;
  566:                       {value,#edge{ltpr=Same}} -> ok; % Same unused.
  567:                       {value,_} -> error
  568:                   end.
  569:            ">>,
  570:            [warn_unused_vars],
  571:            {warnings,[{{22,41},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Same'}}]}},
  572:           {rec2,
  573:            <<"-record(r, {a,b}).
  574:               f(X, Y) -> #r{a=[K || K <- Y], b=[K || K <- Y]}.
  575:               g(X, Y) -> #r{a=lists:map(fun (K) -> K end, Y),
  576:                             b=lists:map(fun (K) -> K end, Y)}.
  577:               h(X, Y) -> #r{a=case Y of _ when is_list(Y) -> Y end,
  578:                             b=case Y of _ when is_list(Y) -> Y end}.
  579:               i(X, Y) -> #r{a=if is_list(Y) -> Y end, b=if is_list(Y) -> Y end}.
  580:              ">>,
  581:            [warn_unused_vars],
  582:            {warnings,[{{2,17},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  583:                       {{3,17},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  584:                       {{5,17},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  585:                       {{7,17},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}}]}},
  586:           {rec3,
  587:            <<"-record(r, {a}).
  588:               t() -> X = 1, #r{a=foo, a=bar, a=qux}.
  589:              ">>,
  590:            [warn_unused_vars],
  591:            {error,[{{2,39},erl_lint,{redefine_field,r,a}},
  592:                    {{2,46},erl_lint,{redefine_field,r,a}}],
  593:                   [{{2,22},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}}]}}],
  594:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
  595:     ok.
  596: 
  597: %% Warnings for unused variables in funs.
  598: unused_vars_warn_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  599:     Ts = [{fun1,
  600:            <<"a({A,B}) -> % A unused.
  601:                   fun(A) -> B end; % A shadowed. A unused.
  602:               a([A,B]) ->
  603:                   fun(<<A:B>>, % A shadowed. A unused.
  604:                        <<Q:A>>) -> foo % Q unused.
  605:                   end;
  606:               a({A,B,C,D,E}) ->
  607:                   fun(E) when C == <<A:A>>, <<17:B>> == D -> % E shadowed. E unused.
  608:                           foo
  609:                   end,
  610:                   E;
  611:               a([A,B,C,D,E]) -> % E unused.
  612:                   fun() ->
  613:                           (C == <<A:A>>) and (<<17:B>> == D)
  614:                   end.
  615:            ">>,
  616:            [warn_unused_vars],

  618:                       {{2,23},erl_lint,{unused_var,'A'}},

  625:                       {{8,23},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'E','fun'}},
  626:                       {{12,26},erl_lint,{unused_var,'E'}}]}},

  630:                   case foo of
  631:                       true ->
  632:                           U = 2;

  637:                   U; % U unsafe.

  643:                           U = 3

  652:                           U = 3 % U unused.

  655:            ">>,

  663:                {{26,23},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}},
  664:                {{26,23},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'U','fun'}}]}},
  665:           {named_fun,
  666:            <<"u() ->
  667:                   fun U() -> foo end, % U unused.
  668:                   U; % U unbound.

  670:                   case foo of

  672:                           U = 2;
  673:                       false ->
  674:                           true
  675:                   end,

  679:                   case foo of
  680:                       true ->
  681:                           U = 2;
  682:                       false ->
  683:                           U = 3
  684:                   end,

  688:                   case foo of
  689:                       true ->
  690:                           U = 2; % U unused.

  692:                           U = 3 % U unused.
  693:                   end,
  694:                   fun U() -> foo end; % U shadowed. U unused.
  695:               u() ->

  699:               u() ->
  700:                   fun _(N) -> N + 1 end.  % Cover handling of '_' name.
  701:            ">>,
  702:            [warn_unused_vars],
  703:            {error,[{{3,19},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'U'}},
  704:                    {{12,19},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'U',{'case',{5,19}}}}],

  786: %% Warnings for exported variables.
  787: export_vars_warn(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  788:     Ts = [{exp1,
  789:            <<"u() ->
  790:                   case foo of
  791:                       1 ->
  792:                           A = 1,
  793:                           B = 2,
  794:                           W = 3, % W unused.
  795:                           Z = 3; % Z unused.
  796:                       2 ->
  797:                           B = 2,
  798:                           Z = 4 % Z unused.
  799:                   end,
  800:                   case bar of
  801:                       true ->
  802:                           A = 17, % A unsafe.
  803:                           X = 3, % X unused.
  804:                           U = 2,
  805:                           U;
  806:                       false ->
  807:                           B = 19, % B exported.
  808:                           U = 3; % U unused.
  809:                       foo ->
  810:                           X = 3,
  811:                           X;
  812:                       bar ->
  813:                           X = 9, % X unused.
  814:                           U = 14 % U unused.
  815:                   end.
  816:            ">>,
  817:            [warn_unused_vars],
  818:            {error,[{{14,27},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'A',{'case',{2,19}}}}],
  819:                   [{{6,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'W'}},
  820:                    {{7,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Z'}},
  821:                    {{10,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Z'}},
  822:                    {{15,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  823:                    {{19,27},erl_lint,{exported_var,'B',{'case',{2,19}}}},
  824:                    {{20,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}},
  825:                    {{25,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  826:                    {{26,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}}]}},
  827: 
  828:           {exp2,
  829:            <<"bin(A) ->
  830:                   receive
  831:                       M ->
  832:                            X = M,
  833:                            Y = M,
  834:                            Z = M
  835:                   end,

  837:                   Y = B, % Y exported. B unbound.
  838:                   [B || B <- Z]. % Z exported. B shadowed.
  839:            ">>,
  840:            [warn_export_vars],
  841:            {error,[{{9,23},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'B'}}],

  844:                    {{10,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'B',generate}},

  846:

  848:            <<"bin(A) ->
  849:                   receive
  850:                       M ->
  851:                            X = M,

  856:                   Y = B, % Y exported. B unbound.

  859:            [],

  879: %% Shadowed variables are tested in other places, but here we test
  880: %% that the warning can be turned off.
  881: shadow_vars(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  882:     Ts = [{shadow1,
  883: 	   <<"bin(A) ->
  884:                   receive
  885:                       M ->
  886:                            X = M,
  887:                            Y = M,
  888:                            Z = M
  889:                   end,
  890:                   [B || <<B:X>> <- A],
  891:                   Y = B,
  892:                   [B || B <- Z]. % B shadowed.
  893:            ">>,
  894: 	   [nowarn_shadow_vars],
  895: 	   {error,[{{9,23},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'B'}}],
  896: 	    [{{9,19},erl_lint,{exported_var,'Y',{'receive',{2,19}}}}]}},
  897:           {shadow2,
  898:            <<"t() ->
  899:                   _ = (catch MS = MS = 1), % MS used unsafe
  900:                   _ = case ok of _ -> fun() -> ok end end,
  901:                   fun (MS) -> MS end. % MS not shadowed here
  902:            ">>,
  903:            [],
  904:            []}],
  905:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
  906:     ok.

 1610: %% OTP-4670. Guards, is_record in particular.
 1611: guard(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1612:     %% Well, these could be plain code...
 1613:     Ts = [{guard1,
 1614:            <<"-record(apa, {}).
 1615:               t(A) when atom(A) ->
 1616:                   atom;
 1617:               t(A) when binary(A) ->
 1618:                   binary;
 1619:               t(A) when constant(A) ->
 1620:                   constant;
 1621:               t(A) when float(A) ->
 1622:                   float;
 1623:               t(A) when function(A) ->
 1624:                   function;
 1625:               t(A) when integer(A) ->

 2491: %% OTP-15456. All compiler options can now be given in the option list
 2492: %% (as opposed to only in files).
 2493: otp_15456(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2494:     Ts = [
 2495:           %% {nowarn_deprecated_function,[{M,F,A}]} can now be given
 2496:           %% in the option list as well as in an attribute.
 2497:           %% Wherever it occurs, it is not affected by
 2498:           %% warn_deprecated_function.
 2499:           {otp_15456_1,
 2500:            <<"-compile({nowarn_deprecated_function,{erlang,now,0}}).
 2501:               -export([foo/0]).
 2502: 
 2503:               foo() ->
 2504:                   {erlang:now(), random:seed0(), random:seed(1, 2, 3),
 2505:                    random:uniform(), random:uniform(42)}.
 2506:            ">>,
 2507:            {[{nowarn_deprecated_function,{random,seed0,0}},
 2508:              {nowarn_deprecated_function,[{random,uniform,0},
 2509:                                           {random,uniform,1}]},
 2510:              %% There should be no warnings when attempting to
 2511:              %% turn of warnings for functions that are not
 2512:              %% deprecated or not used in the module.
 2513:              {nowarn_deprecated_function,{random,uniform_s,1}},
 2514:              {nowarn_deprecated_function,{erlang,abs,1}},
 2515:              warn_deprecated_function]},
 2516:            {warnings,[{{5,50},erl_lint,
 2517:                        {deprecated,{random,seed,3},
 2518:                         "use the 'rand' module instead"}}]}},
 2519: 
 2520:           %% {nowarn_unused_function,[{M,F,A}]} can be given
 2521:           %% in the option list as well as in an attribute.
 2522:           %% It was incorrectly documented to only work when
 2523:           %% given in an attribute.
 2524:           {otp_15456_2,
 2525:            <<"-compile({nowarn_unused_function,foo/0}).
 2526:               foo() -> ok.
 2527:               bar() -> ok.
 2528:               foobar() -> ok.
 2529:               barf(_) -> ok.
 2530:               other() -> ok.
 2531:            ">>,
 2532:            {[{nowarn_unused_function,[{bar,0},{foobar,0}]},
 2533:              {nowarn_unused_function,{barf,1}},
 2534:              %% There should be no warnings when attempting to
 2535:              %% turn of warnings for unused functions that are not
 2536:              %% defined in the module.
 2537:              {nowarn_unused_function,{not_defined_in_module,1}},
 2538:              warn_unused_function]},
 2539:            {warnings,[{{6,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{other,0}}}]}
 2540:           }],
 2541: 
 2542:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 2543:     ok.

 3175:                   size(X).
 3176:

 3178:               %% are unambigous.

 3191: 	  %% Verify that warnings cannot be turned off in the old way.
 3192: 	  {clash2,
 3193:            <<"-export([t/1,size/1]).
 3194:               t(X) ->
 3195:                   size(X).
 3196: 
 3197:               size({N,_}) ->
 3198:                 N.
 3199: 
 3200:               %% My own abs/1 function works on lists too. From R14 this really works.
 3201:               abs([H|T]) when $a =< H, H =< $z -> [H-($a-$A)|abs(T)];
 3202:               abs([H|T]) -> [H|abs(T)];
 3203:               abs([]) -> [];
 3204:               abs(X) -> erlang:abs(X).
 3205:              ">>,
 3206: 	   {[nowarn_unused_function,nowarn_bif_clash]},
 3207: 	   {errors,[{erl_lint,disallowed_nowarn_bif_clash}],[]}},
 3208: 	  %% As long as noone calls an overridden BIF, it's totally OK
 3209: 	  {clash3,
 3210:            <<"-export([size/1]).
 3211:               size({N,_}) ->
 3212:                 N;
 3213:               size(X) ->
 3214:                 erlang:size(X).
 3215:              ">>,
 3216: 	   [],
 3217: 	   []},
 3218: 	  %% But this is totally wrong - meaning of the program changed in R14, so this is an error
 3219: 	  {clash4,
 3220:            <<"-export([size/1]).
 3221:               size({N,_}) ->
 3222:                 N;
 3223:               size(X) ->
 3224:                 size(X).
 3225:              ">>,
 3226: 	   [],
 3227: 	   {errors,[{{5,17},erl_lint,{call_to_redefined_old_bif,{size,1}}}],[]}},
 3228: 	  %% For a post R14 bif, its only a warning
 3229: 	  {clash5,
 3230:            <<"-export([binary_part/2]).
 3231:               binary_part({B,_},{X,Y}) ->
 3232:                 binary_part(B,{X,Y});
 3233:               binary_part(B,{X,Y}) ->
 3234:                 binary:part(B,X,Y).
 3235:              ">>,
 3236: 	   [],
 3237: 	   {warnings,[{{3,17},erl_lint,{call_to_redefined_bif,{binary_part,2}}}]}},
 3238: 	  %% If you really mean to call yourself here, you can "unimport" size/1
 3239: 	  {clash6,
 3240:            <<"-export([size/1]).
 3241:               -compile({no_auto_import,[size/1]}).
 3242:               size([]) ->
 3243:                 0;
 3244:               size({N,_}) ->
 3245:                 N;
 3246:               size([_|T]) ->
 3247:                 1+size(T).
 3248:              ">>,
 3249: 	   [],
 3250: 	   []},
 3251: 	  %% Same for the post R14 autoimport warning
 3252: 	  {clash7,
 3253:            <<"-export([binary_part/2]).
 3254:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/2]}).
 3255:               binary_part({B,_},{X,Y}) ->
 3256:                 binary_part(B,{X,Y});
 3257:               binary_part(B,{X,Y}) ->
 3258:                 binary:part(B,X,Y).
 3259:              ">>,
 3260: 	   [],
 3261: 	   []},
 3262:           %% but this doesn't mean the local function is allowed in a guard...
 3263: 	  {clash8,
 3264:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3265:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/2]}).
 3266:               x(X) when binary_part(X,{1,2}) =:= <<1,2>> ->
 3267:                  hej.
 3268:               binary_part({B,_},{X,Y}) ->
 3269:                 binary_part(B,{X,Y});
 3270:               binary_part(B,{X,Y}) ->
 3271:                 binary:part(B,X,Y).
 3272:              ">>,
 3273: 	   [],
 3274: 	   {errors,[{{3,25},erl_lint,{illegal_guard_local_call,{binary_part,2}}}],[]}},
 3275:           %% no_auto_import is not like nowarn_bif_clash, it actually removes the autoimport
 3276: 	  {clash9,
 3277:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3278:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/2]}).
 3279:               x(X) ->
 3280:                  binary_part(X,{1,2}) =:= <<1,2>>.
 3281:              ">>,
 3282: 	   [],
 3283: 	   {errors,[{{4,18},erl_lint,{undefined_function,{binary_part,2}}}],[]}},
 3284:           %% but we could import it again...
 3285: 	  {clash10,
 3286:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3287:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/2]}).
 3288:               -import(erlang,[binary_part/2]).
 3289:               x(X) ->
 3290:                  binary_part(X,{1,2}) =:= <<1,2>>.
 3291:              ">>,
 3292: 	   [],
 3293: 	   []},
 3294:           %% and actually use it in a guard...
 3295: 	  {clash11,
 3296:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3297:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/2]}).
 3298:               -import(erlang,[binary_part/2]).
 3299:               x(X) when binary_part(X,{0,1}) =:= <<0>> ->
 3300:                  binary_part(X,{1,2}) =:= <<1,2>>.
 3301:              ">>,
 3302: 	   [],
 3303: 	   []},
 3304:           %% but for non-obvious historical reasons, imported functions cannot be used in
 3305: 	  %% fun construction without the module name...
 3306: 	  {clash12,
 3307:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3308:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/2]}).
 3309:               -import(erlang,[binary_part/2]).
 3310:               x(X) when binary_part(X,{0,1}) =:= <<0>> ->
 3311:                  binary_part(X,{1,2}) =:= fun binary_part/2.
 3312:              ">>,
 3313: 	   [],
 3314: 	   {errors,[{{5,43},erl_lint,{undefined_function,{binary_part,2}}}],[]}},
 3315:           %% Not from erlang and not from anywhere else
 3316: 	  {clash13,
 3317:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3318:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/2]}).
 3319:               -import(x,[binary_part/2]).
 3320:               x(X) ->
 3321:                  binary_part(X,{1,2}) =:= fun binary_part/2.
 3322:              ">>,
 3323: 	   [],
 3324: 	   {errors,[{{5,43},erl_lint,{undefined_function,{binary_part,2}}}],[]}},
 3325: 	  %% ...while real auto-import is OK.
 3326: 	  {clash14,
 3327:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3328:               x(X) when binary_part(X,{0,1}) =:= <<0>> ->
 3329:                  binary_part(X,{1,2}) =:= fun binary_part/2.
 3330:              ">>,
 3331: 	   [],
 3332: 	   []},
 3333:           %% Import directive clashing with old bif is an error, regardless of if it's called or not
 3334: 	  {clash15,
 3335:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3336:               -import(x,[abs/1]).
 3337:               x(X) ->
 3338:                  binary_part(X,{1,2}).
 3339:              ">>,
 3340: 	   [],
 3341: 	   {errors,[{{2,16},erl_lint,{redefine_old_bif_import,{abs,1}}}],[]}},
 3342: 	  %% For a new BIF, it's only a warning
 3343: 	  {clash16,
 3344:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3345:               -import(x,[binary_part/3]).
 3346:               x(X) ->
 3347:                  abs(X).
 3348:              ">>,
 3349: 	   [],
 3350: 	   {warnings,[{{2,16},erl_lint,{redefine_bif_import,{binary_part,3}}}]}},
 3351: 	  %% And, you cannot redefine already imported things that aren't auto-imported
 3352: 	  {clash17,
 3353:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3354:               -import(x,[binary_port/3]).
 3355:               -import(y,[binary_port/3]).
 3356:               x(X) ->
 3357:                  abs(X).
 3358:              ">>,
 3359: 	   [],
 3360: 	   {errors,[{{3,16},erl_lint,{redefine_import,{{binary_port,3},x}}}],[]}},
 3361: 	  %% Not with local functions either
 3362: 	  {clash18,
 3363:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3364:               -import(x,[binary_port/3]).
 3365:               binary_port(A,B,C) ->
 3366:                  binary_part(A,B,C).
 3367:               x(X) ->
 3368:                  abs(X).
 3369:              ">>,
 3370: 	   [],
 3371: 	   {errors,[{{3,15},erl_lint,{define_import,{binary_port,3}}}],[]}},
 3372: 	  %% Like clash8: Dont accept a guard if it's explicitly module-name called either
 3373: 	  {clash19,
 3374:            <<"-export([binary_port/3]).
 3375:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/3]}).
 3376:               -import(x,[binary_part/3]).
 3377:               binary_port(A,B,C) when x:binary_part(A,B,C) ->
 3378:                  binary_part(A,B,C+1).
 3379:              ">>,
 3380: 	   [],
 3381: 	   {errors,[{{4,39},erl_lint,illegal_guard_expr}],[]}},
 3382: 	  %% Not with local functions either
 3383: 	  {clash20,
 3384:            <<"-export([binary_port/3]).
 3385:               -import(x,[binary_part/3]).
 3386:               binary_port(A,B,C) ->
 3387:                  binary_part(A,B,C).
 3388:              ">>,
 3389: 	   [warn_unused_import],
 3390: 	   {warnings,[{{2,16},erl_lint,{redefine_bif_import,{binary_part,3}}}]}},
 3391: 	  %% Don't accept call to a guard BIF if there is a local definition
 3392: 	  %% or an import with the same name. Note: is_record/2 is an
 3393: 	  %% exception, since it is more of syntatic sugar than a real BIF.
 3394: 	  {clash21,
 3395:            <<"-export([is_list/1]).
 3396:               -import(x, [is_tuple/1]).
 3397:               -record(r, {a,b}).
 3398:               x(T) when is_tuple(T) -> ok;
 3399:               x(T) when is_list(T) -> ok.
 3400:               y(T) when is_tuple(T) =:= true -> ok;
 3401:               y(T) when is_list(T) =:= true -> ok;
 3402:               y(T) when is_record(T, r, 3) -> ok;
 3403:               y(T) when is_record(T, r, 3) =:= true -> ok;
 3404:               y(T) when is_record(T, r) =:= true -> ok.
 3405:               is_list(_) ->
 3406:                 ok.
 3407:               is_record(_, _) ->
 3408:                 ok.
 3409:               is_record(_, _, _) ->
 3410:                 ok.
 3411:              ">>,
 3412: 	   [{no_auto_import,[{is_tuple,1}]}],
 3413: 	   {errors,[{{4,25},erl_lint,{illegal_guard_local_call,{is_tuple,1}}},
 3414: 		    {{5,25},erl_lint,{illegal_guard_local_call,{is_list,1}}},
 3415: 		    {{6,25},erl_lint,{illegal_guard_local_call,{is_tuple,1}}},
 3416: 		    {{7,25},erl_lint,{illegal_guard_local_call,{is_list,1}}},
 3417: 		    {{8,25},erl_lint,{illegal_guard_local_call,{is_record,3}}},
 3418: 		    {{9,25},erl_lint,{illegal_guard_local_call,{is_record,3}}}],[]}},
 3419: 	  %% We can also suppress all auto imports at once
 3420: 	  {clash22,
 3421:           <<"-export([size/1, binary_part/2]).
 3422:              -compile(no_auto_import).
 3423:              size([]) ->
 3424:                0;
 3425:              size({N,_}) ->
 3426:                N;
 3427:              size([_|T]) ->
 3428:                1+size(T).
 3429:              binary_part({B,_},{X,Y}) ->
 3430:                binary_part(B,{X,Y});
 3431:              binary_part(B,{X,Y}) ->
 3432:                binary:part(B,X,Y).
 3433:             ">>,
 3434: 	   [],
 3435: 	   []}
 3436: 	 ],
 3437: 
 3438:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 3439:     ok.

 3441: %% Basic tests with one behaviour.
 3442: behaviour_basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3443:     Ts = [{behaviour1,
 3444:            <<"-behaviour(application).
 3445:              ">>,
 3446:            [],
 3447: 	   {warnings,[{{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{start,2},application}},
 3448: 		      {{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{stop,1},application}}]}},
 3449: 
 3450: 	  {behaviour2,
 3451:            <<"-behaviour(application).
 3452:               -export([stop/1]).
 3453:               stop(_) -> ok.
 3454:              ">>,
 3455:            [],
 3456: 	   {warnings,[{{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{start,2},application}}]}},
 3457: 	  
 3458: 	  {behaviour3,
 3459:            <<"-behavior(application).  %% Test American spelling.
 3460:               -export([start/2,stop/1]).
 3461:               start(_, _) -> ok.
 3462:               stop(_) -> ok.
 3463:              ">>,
 3464:            [],
 3465:            []},
 3466: 
 3467:           {behaviour4,
 3468:            <<"-behavior(application).  %% Test callbacks with export_all
 3469:               -compile([export_all, nowarn_export_all]).
 3470:               stop(_) -> ok.
 3471:              ">>,
 3472:            [],
 3473:            {warnings,[{{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{start,2},application}}]}}
 3474: 	 ],
 3475:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 3476: 
 3477:     Subst0 = #{behaviour1 => [nowarn_undefined_behaviour_func],
 3478:                behaviour2 => [nowarn_undefined_behaviour_func],
 3479:                behaviour4 => [nowarn_undefined_behaviour_func]},
 3480:     [] = run(Config, rewrite(Ts, Subst0)),
 3481: 
 3482:     Subst = #{K => [nowarn_behaviours] || K := _ <- Subst0},
 3483:     [] = run(Config, rewrite(Ts, Subst)),
 3484: 
 3485:     ok.

 3487: %% Basic tests with multiple behaviours.
 3488: behaviour_multiple(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3489:     Ts = [{behaviour1,
 3490:            <<"-behaviour(application).
 3491:               -behaviour(supervisor).
 3492:              ">>,
 3493:            [],
 3494: 	   {warnings,[{{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{start,2},application}},
 3495: 		      {{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{stop,1},application}},
 3496: 		      {{2,16},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{init,1},supervisor}}]}},
 3497: 
 3498: 	  {behaviour2,
 3499:            <<"-behaviour(application).
 3500:               -behaviour(supervisor).
 3501:               -export([start/2,stop/1,init/1]).
 3502:               start(_, _) -> ok.
 3503:               stop(_) -> ok.
 3504:               init(_) -> ok.
 3505:              ">>,
 3506:            [],
 3507: 	   []},
 3508: 
 3509: 	  {american_behavior2,
 3510:            <<"-behavior(application).
 3511:               -behavior(supervisor).
 3512:               -export([start/2,stop/1,init/1]).
 3513:               start(_, _) -> ok.
 3514:               stop(_) -> ok.
 3515:               init(_) -> ok.
 3516:              ">>,
 3517:            [],
 3518: 	   []},
 3519: 
 3520: 	  {behaviour3,
 3521:            <<"-behaviour(gen_server).
 3522:               -behaviour(supervisor).
 3523:               -export([handle_call/3,handle_cast/2,handle_info/2]).
 3524:               handle_call(_, _, _) -> ok.
 3525:               handle_cast(_, _) -> ok.
 3526:               handle_info(_, _) -> ok.
 3527:              ">>,
 3528:            [],
 3529: 	   {warnings,[{{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{init,1},gen_server}},
 3530: 		      {{2,16},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{init,1},supervisor}},
 3531: 		      {{2,16},
 3532: 		       erl_lint,
 3533: 		       {conflicting_behaviours,{init,1},supervisor,{1,22},gen_server}}]}},
 3534: 	  {american_behavior3,
 3535:            <<"-behavior(gen_server).
 3536:               -behavior(supervisor).
 3537:               -export([handle_call/3,handle_cast/2,handle_info/2]).
 3538:               handle_call(_, _, _) -> ok.
 3539:               handle_cast(_, _) -> ok.
 3540:               handle_info(_, _) -> ok.
 3541:              ">>,
 3542:            [],
 3543: 	   {warnings,[{{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{init,1},gen_server}},
 3544: 		      {{2,16},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{init,1},supervisor}},
 3545: 		      {{2,16},
 3546: 		       erl_lint,
 3547: 		       {conflicting_behaviours,{init,1},supervisor,{1,22},gen_server}}]}},
 3548: 
 3549: 	  {behaviour4,
 3550:            <<"-behaviour(gen_server).
 3551:               -behaviour(gen_statem).
 3552:               -behaviour(supervisor).
 3553:               -export([init/1,handle_call/3,handle_cast/2,
 3554:                        handle_info/2,handle_info/3,
 3555:                        handle_event/3,handle_sync_event/4,
 3556:                        code_change/3,code_change/4,
 3557:                        terminate/2,terminate/3,terminate/4,
 3558:                        callback_mode/0]).
 3559:               init(_) -> ok.
 3560:               handle_call(_, _, _) -> ok.
 3561:               handle_event(_, _, _) -> ok.
 3562:               handle_sync_event(_, _, _, _) -> ok.
 3563:               handle_cast(_, _) -> ok.
 3564:               handle_info(_, _) -> ok.
 3565:               handle_info(_, _, _) -> ok.
 3566:               code_change(_, _, _) -> ok.
 3567:               code_change(_, _, _, _) -> ok.
 3568:               terminate(_, _) -> ok.
 3569:               terminate(_, _, _) -> ok.
 3570:               terminate(_, _, _, _) -> ok.
 3571:               callback_mode() -> state_functions.
 3572:              ">>,
 3573:            [],
 3574: 	   {warnings,[{{2,16},
 3575: 		       erl_lint,
 3576: 		       {conflicting_behaviours,{init,1},gen_statem,{1,22},gen_server}},
 3577: 		      {{3,16},
 3578: 		       erl_lint,
 3579: 		       {conflicting_behaviours,{init,1},supervisor,{1,22},gen_server}}]}}
 3580: 	 ],
 3581:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 3582: 
 3583:     Subst = #{behaviour3 => [nowarn_undefined_behaviour_func,
 3584:                              nowarn_conflicting_behaviours],
 3585:               american_behavior3 => [nowarn_undefined_behaviour_func,
 3586:                                      nowarn_conflicting_behaviours],
 3587:               behaviour4 => [nowarn_conflicting_behaviours]},
 3588:     [] = run(Config, rewrite(Ts, Subst)),
 3589: 
 3590:     ok.
 3591: 
 3592: %% OTP-11861. behaviour_info() and -callback.
 3593: otp_11861(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 3594:     CallbackFiles = [callback1, callback2, callback3,
 3595:                      bad_behaviour1, bad_behaviour2,
 3596:                      bad_behaviour3],
 3597:     lists:foreach(fun(M) ->
 3598:                           F = filename:join(?datadir, M),
 3599:                           Opts = [{outdir,?privdir}, return],
 3600:                           {ok, M, []} = compile:file(F, Opts)
 3601:                   end, CallbackFiles),
 3602:     CodePath = code:get_path(),
 3603:     true = code:add_path(?privdir),
 3604:     Ts = [{otp_11861_1,
 3605:            <<"
 3606:               -export([b1/1]).
 3607:               -behaviour(callback1).
 3608:               -behaviour(callback2).
 3609: 
 3610:               -spec b1(atom()) -> integer().
 3611:               b1(A) when is_atom(A)->
 3612:                   3.
 3613:              ">>,
 3614:            [],
 3615:            %% b2/1 is optional in both modules
 3616:            {warnings,[{{4,16},erl_lint,
 3617:                        {conflicting_behaviours,{b1,1},callback2,{3,16},callback1}}]}},
 3618:           {otp_11861_2,
 3619:            <<"
 3620:               -export([b2/1]).
 3621:               -behaviour(callback1).
 3622:               -behaviour(callback2).
 3623: 
 3624:               -spec b2(integer()) -> atom().
 3625:               b2(I) when is_integer(I)->
 3626:                   a.
 3627:              ">>,
 3628:            [],
 3629:            %% b2/1 is optional in callback2, but not in callback1
 3630:            {warnings,[{{3,16},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{b1,1},callback1}},
 3631:                       {{4,16},erl_lint,
 3632:                        {conflicting_behaviours,{b2,1},callback2,{3,16},callback1}}]}},
 3633:           {otp_11861_3,
 3634:            <<"
 3635:               -callback b(_) -> atom().
 3636:               -optional_callbacks({b1,1}). % non-existing and ignored
 3637:              ">>,
 3638:            [],
 3639:            []},
 3640:           {otp_11861_4,
 3641:            <<"
 3642:               -callback b(_) -> atom().
 3643:               -optional_callbacks([{b1,1}]). % non-existing
 3644:              ">>,
 3645:            [],
 3646:            %% No behaviour-info(), but callback.
 3647:            {errors,[{{3,16},erl_lint,{undefined_callback,{lint_test,b1,1}}}],[]}},
 3648:           {otp_11861_5,
 3649:            <<"
 3650:               -optional_callbacks([{b1,1}]). % non-existing
 3651:              ">>,
 3652:            [],
 3653:            %% No behaviour-info() and no callback: warning anyway
 3654:            {errors,[{{2,16},erl_lint,{undefined_callback,{lint_test,b1,1}}}],[]}},
 3655:           {otp_11861_6,
 3656:            <<"
 3657:               -optional_callbacks([b1/1]). % non-existing
 3658:               behaviour_info(callbacks) -> [{b1,1}].
 3659:              ">>,
 3660:            [],
 3661:            %% behaviour-info() and no callback: warning anyway
 3662:            {errors,[{{2,16},erl_lint,{undefined_callback,{lint_test,b1,1}}}],[]}},
 3663:           {otp_11861_7,
 3664:            <<"
 3665:               -optional_callbacks([b1/1]). % non-existing
 3666:               -callback b(_) -> atom().
 3667:               behaviour_info(callbacks) -> [{b1,1}].
 3668:              ">>,
 3669:            [],
 3670:            %% behaviour-info() callback: warning
 3671:            {errors,[{{2,16},erl_lint,{undefined_callback,{lint_test,b1,1}}},
 3672:                     {{3,16},erl_lint,{behaviour_info,{lint_test,b,1}}}],
 3673:             []}},
 3674:           {otp_11861_8,
 3675:            <<"
 3676:               -callback b(_) -> atom().
 3677:               -optional_callbacks([b/1, {b, 1}]).
 3678:              ">>,
 3679:            [],
 3680:            {errors,[{{3,16},erl_lint,{redefine_optional_callback,{b,1}}}],[]}},
 3681:           {otp_11861_9,
 3682:            <<"
 3683:               -behaviour(gen_server).
 3684:               -export([handle_call/3,handle_cast/2,handle_info/2,
 3685:                        code_change/3, init/1, terminate/2]).
 3686:               handle_call(_, _, _) -> ok.
 3687:               handle_cast(_, _) -> ok.
 3688:               handle_info(_, _) -> ok.
 3689:               code_change(_, _, _) -> ok.
 3690:               init(_) -> ok.
 3691:               terminate(_, _) -> ok.
 3692:              ">>,
 3693:            [],
 3694:            %% Nothing...
 3695:            []},
 3696:           {otp_11861_9,
 3697:            <<"
 3698:               -behaviour(gen_server).
 3699:               -export([handle_call/3,handle_cast/2,handle_info/2,
 3700:                        code_change/3, init/1, terminate/2,
 3701:                        format_status/1, format_status/2]).
 3702:               handle_call(_, _, _) -> ok.
 3703:               handle_cast(_, _) -> ok.
 3704:               handle_info(_, _) -> ok.
 3705:               code_change(_, _, _) -> ok.
 3706:               init(_) -> ok.
 3707:               terminate(_, _) -> ok.
 3708:               format_status(_) -> ok. % optional callback
 3709:               format_status(_, _) -> ok. % deprecated optional callback
 3710:              ">>,
 3711:            [],
 3712:            {warnings,[{{2,16},
 3713:                        erl_lint,
 3714:                        {deprecated_callback,{gen_server,format_status,2},
 3715:                         "use format_status/1 instead"}}]}},
 3716:           {otp_11861_10,
 3717:            <<"
 3718:               -optional_callbacks([{b1,1,bad}]). % badly formed and ignored
 3719:               behaviour_info(callbacks) -> [{b1,1}].
 3720:              ">>,
 3721:            [],
 3722:            []},
 3723:           {otp_11861_11,
 3724:            <<"
 3725:               -behaviour(bad_behaviour1).
 3726:              ">>,
 3727:            [],
 3728:            {warnings,[{{2,16},erl_lint,
 3729:                        {ill_defined_behaviour_callbacks,bad_behaviour1}}]}},
 3730:           {otp_11861_12,
 3731:            <<"
 3732:               -behaviour(non_existing_behaviour).
 3733:              ">>,
 3734:            [],
 3735:            {warnings,[{{2,16},erl_lint,
 3736:                        {undefined_behaviour,non_existing_behaviour}}]}},
 3737:           {otp_11861_13,
 3738:            <<"
 3739:               -behaviour(bad_behaviour_none).
 3740:              ">>,
 3741:            [],

 3746:              ">>,

 3751:               -optional_callbacks([{b1,1,bad}]). % badly formed
 3752:               -callback b(_) -> atom().
 3753:              ">>,
 3754:            [],
 3755:            []},

 3758:               -callback b(_) -> atom().
 3759:               -callback b(_) -> atom().
 3760:              ">>,
 3761:            [],
 3762:            {errors,[{{3,16},erl_lint,{redefine_callback,{b,1}}}],[]}},

 3765:               -behaviour(bad_behaviour2).
 3766:              ">>,
 3767:            [],
 3768:            {warnings,[{{2,16},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_callbacks,
 3769:                                    bad_behaviour2}}]}},

 3771:            <<"
 3772:               -export([f1/1]).
 3773:               -behaviour(callback3).
 3774:               f1(_) -> ok.
 3775:              ">>,
 3776:            [],
 3777:            []},
 3778: 
 3779:           {otp_11861_19,
 3780:            <<"
 3781:               -export([good/1]).
 3782:               -behaviour(bad_behaviour3).
 3783:               good(_) -> ok.
 3784:              ">>,
 3785:            [],

 3787: 	 ],

 3789: 
 3790:     Subst0 = #{otp_11861_1 => [nowarn_conflicting_behaviours],

 3794:                otp_11861_17 => [nowarn_undefined_behaviour_callbacks],
 3795:                otp_11861_19 => [nowarn_ill_defined_optional_callbacks]
 3796:               },
 3797:     [] = run(Conf, rewrite(Ts, Subst0)),
 3798: 
 3799:     Subst = #{K => [nowarn_behaviours] || K := _ <- Subst0},
 3800:     [] = run(Conf, rewrite(Ts, Subst)),
 3801: 
 3802:     true = code:set_path(CodePath),
 3803:     ok.

 3856: 
 3857: %% Check that format warnings are generated.
 3858: format_warn(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3859:     L1 = 23,
 3860:     L2 = 5,
 3861:     format_level(1, L1, Config),
 3862:     format_level(2, L1+L2, Config),
 3863:     format_level(3, L1+L2, Config),             %there is no level 3
 3864:     ok.
 3865: 
 3866: format_level(Level, Count, Config) ->
 3867:     W = get_compilation_result(Config, "format",
 3868:                                      [{warn_format, Level}]),
 3869:     %% Pick out the 'format' warnings.
 3870:     FW = lists:filter(fun({_Line, erl_lint, {format_error, _}}) -> true;
 3871:                                (_) -> false
 3872:                             end,
 3873:                             W),
 3874:     case length(FW) of
 3875:               Count ->
 3876:                   ok;
 3877:               Other ->
 3878:                   io:format("Expected ~w warning(s); got ~w", [Count,Other]),
 3879:                   fail()
 3880:           end,
 3881:     ok.
 3882:

 3887:     Ts = [{on_load_1,

 3892:              ">>,

 3900:              ">>,

 3902: 	   []},

 3909:              bar(N) -> 2*N.

 4231:                [#{K1 := V1} =
 4232:                 #{K2 := V2} =
 4233:                 #{k1 := K1,k2 := K2}] = [M],
 4234:                [V1,V2].
 4235:            ">>,
 4236:            [],

 4240:            <<"
 4241:            t(#{} = M) ->
 4242:                [#{k := K} = #{K := V}] = [M],
 4243:                V.
 4244:            ">>,
 4245:            [],
 4246:            {errors,[{{3,31},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'K'}}],[]}},

 4248:            <<"
 4249:            t(#{} = M,K1,K2) ->
 4250:                #{K1 := V1} =
 4251:                #{K2 := V2} =
 4252:                #{k1 := K1,k2 := K2} = M,
 4253:                [V1,V2].
 4254:            ">>,
 4255:            [],
 4256:            []},
 4257:           {parallel_map_patterns_bound2,
 4258:            <<"
 4259:            t(#{} = M) ->
 4260:                #{K := V} = #{k := K} = M,
 4261:                V.
 4262:            ">>,
 4263:            [],
 4264:            []},
 4265:           {parallel_map_patterns_bound3,
 4266:            <<"
 4267:            t(#{} = M) ->
 4268:                #{K1 := V1} =
 4269:                #{K2 := V2} =
 4270:                #{k1 := K1,k2 := K2} = M,
 4271:                [V1,V2].
 4272:            ">>,
 4273:            [],
 4274:            []},
 4275:           {parallel_map_patterns_literal,
 4276:            <<"
 4277:            t(#{} = M) ->
 4278:                #{k1 := V1} =
 4279:                #{k2 := V2} =
 4280:                #{k1 := V1,k2 := V2} = M,
 4281:                [V1,V2].
 4282:            ">>,
 4283:            [],
 4284:            []}],
 4285:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 4286:     ok.

 4374: %% OTP-11879: The -spec f/a :: (As) -> B; syntax removed,
 4375: %% and is_subtype/2 deprecated.
 4376: otp_11879(_Config) ->
 4377:     Fs = [{attribute,0,file,{"file.erl",0}},
 4378:           {attribute,0,module,m},
 4379:           {attribute,1,spec,
 4380:            {{f,1},
 4381:             [{type,2,'fun',[{type,3,product,[{var,4,'V1'},
 4382:                                              {var,5,'V1'}]},
 4383:                             {type,6,integer,[]}]}]}},
 4384:           {attribute,20,callback,
 4385:            {{cb,21},
 4386:             [{type,22,'fun',[{type,23,product,[{var,24,'V1'},
 4387:                                                {var,25,'V1'}]},
 4388:                              {type,6,integer,[]}]}]}}],
 4389:     {error,[{"file.erl",
 4390:              [{1,erl_lint,{spec_fun_undefined,{f,1}}},
 4391:               {2,erl_lint,spec_wrong_arity},
 4392:               {22,erl_lint,callback_wrong_arity}]}],
 4393:      []} = compile_forms(Fs, [return,report]),
 4394:     ok.
 4395: 
 4396: compile_forms(Terms, Opts) ->
 4397:     Forms = [erl_parse:anno_from_term(Term) || Term <- Terms],
 4398:     compile:forms(Forms, Opts).
 4399:

 4404:              {{1,2},erl_lint,{bad_deprecated,{frutt,0}}}],
 4405:      []} = run_test2(Config, Abstr, []),
 4406:     ok.

 4468: %% OTP-14285: We currently don't support non-latin1 module names.
 4469: 
 4470: non_latin1_module(Config) ->
 4471:     Expected = [non_latin1_module_unsupported],
 4472:     Expected = check_module_name(''),
 4473:     Expected = check_module_name(list_to_atom([256,$a,$b,$c])),
 4474:     Expected = check_module_name(list_to_atom([$a,$b,256,$c])),
 4475: 
 4476:     "module names with non-latin1 characters are not supported" =
 4477:         format_error(non_latin1_module_unsupported),
 4478:     BadCallback =
 4479:         {bad_callback,{' ',' ',0}},
 4480:     BadModule =
 4481:         {bad_module,{' ',' ',0}},
 4482:     "explicit module not allowed for callback "
 4483:     "' ':' '/0" =
 4484:         format_error(BadCallback),
 4485:     UndefBehav = {undefined_behaviour,' '},
 4486:     "behaviour ' ' undefined" =
 4487:         format_error(UndefBehav),
 4488:     Ts = [{non_latin1_module,
 4489:            <<"
 4490:             %% Report uses of module names with non-Latin-1 characters.
 4491: 
 4492:             -import(' ', []).
 4493:             -behaviour(' ').
 4494:             -behavior(' ').
 4495: 
 4496:             -callback ' ':' '() -> a.
 4497: 
 4498:             %% erl_lint:gexpr/3 is not extended to check module name here:
 4499:             t1() when ' ':' '(1) ->
 4500:                 b.
 4501: 
 4502:             t2() ->
 4503:                 ' ':' '().
 4504: 
 4505:             -spec ' ':' '() -> atom().
 4506: 
 4507:             -spec ' '(integer()) ->
 4508:               ' ':' '().
 4509: 
 4510:             ' '(1) ->
 4511:                 ' ':f(),
 4512:                 F = f,
 4513:                 ' ':F()."/utf8>>,
 4514:            [],
 4515:            {error,
 4516:             [{{4,14},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4517:              {{5,14},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4518:              {{6,14},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4519:              {{8,14},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4520:              {{8,14},erl_lint,BadCallback},
 4521:              {{11,23},erl_lint,illegal_guard_expr},
 4522:              {{15,17},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4523:              {{17,14},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4524:              {{17,14},erl_lint,BadModule},
 4525:              {{20,15},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4526:              {{23,17},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4527:              {{25,17},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported}],
 4528:             [{{5,14},erl_lint,UndefBehav},
 4529:              {{6,14},erl_lint,UndefBehav}]}}],
 4530:     run(Config, Ts),
 4531:     ok.
 4532: 
 4533: illegal_module_name(_Config) ->
 4534:     [empty_module_name] = check_module_name(''),
 4535: 
 4536:     [ctrl_chars_in_module_name] = check_module_name('\x00'),
 4537:     [ctrl_chars_in_module_name] = check_module_name('abc\x1F'),
 4538:     [ctrl_chars_in_module_name] = check_module_name('\x7F'),
 4539:     [ctrl_chars_in_module_name] = check_module_name('abc\x80'),
 4540:     [ctrl_chars_in_module_name] = check_module_name('abc\x80xyz'),
 4541:     [ctrl_chars_in_module_name] = check_module_name('\x9Fxyz'),
 4542: 
 4543:     [ctrl_chars_in_module_name,
 4544:      non_latin1_module_unsupported] = check_module_name('\x00'),
 4545: 
 4546:     [blank_module_name] = check_module_name(' '),
 4547:     [blank_module_name] = check_module_name('\xA0'),
 4548:     [blank_module_name] = check_module_name('\xAD'),
 4549:     [blank_module_name] = check_module_name('  \xA0\xAD '),
 4550: 
 4551:     %% White space and soft hyphens are OK if there are visible
 4552:     %% characters in the name.
 4553:     ok = check_module_name(' abc '),
 4554:     ok = check_module_name('abc '),
 4555:     ok = check_module_name(' abc '),
 4556:     ok = check_module_name(' abc xyz '),
 4557:     ok = check_module_name(' abc\xADxyz '),
 4558: 
 4559:     ok.
 4560: 
 4561: check_module_name(Mod) ->
 4562:     File = atom_to_list(Mod) ++ ".erl",
 4563:     L1 = erl_anno:new(1),
 4564:     Forms = [{attribute,L1,file,{File,1}},
 4565:              {attribute,L1,module,Mod},
 4566:              {eof,2}],
 4567:     _ = compile:forms(Forms),
 4568:     case compile:forms(Forms, [return]) of
 4569:         {error,Errors,[]} ->
 4570:             [{_ModName,L}] = Errors,
 4571:             lists:sort([Reason || {1,erl_lint,Reason} <- L]);
 4572:         {ok,Mod,Code,Ws} when is_binary(Code), is_list(Ws)  ->
 4573:             ok
 4574:     end.
 4575: 
 4576: otp_14378(Config) ->
 4577:     Ts = [
 4578:           {otp_14378_1,
 4579:            <<"-export([t/0]).
 4580:               -compile({nowarn_deprecated_function,{erlang,now,1}}).
 4581:               t() ->
 4582:                  erlang:now().">>,
 4583:            [],
 4584:            {warnings,[{{4,18},erl_lint,
 4585:                        {deprecated,{erlang,now,0},
 4586:                         "see the \"Time and Time Correction in Erlang\" "
 4587:                         "chapter of the ERTS User's Guide for more "
 4588:                         "information"}}]}}],
 4589:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 4590:     ok.

 4643:                   try error(foo)

 4645:                   end.

 4651:                   Stk = [],
 4652:                   try error(foo)
 4653:                   catch _:_:Stk -> ok
 4654:                   end.
 4655:            ">>,
 4656:            [],
 4657:            {errors,[{{4,29},erl_lint,{stacktrace_bound,'Stk'}}],[]}},

 4660:                   try error(foo)
 4661:                   catch _:{x,T}:T -> ok
 4662:                   end.
 4663:            ">>,
 4664:            [],

 4671:                   end.

 4757: removed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4758:     Ts = [{removed,

 4760:              -removed([frutt/0]).   %% okay since frutt/0 is not exported
 4761:              -removed([t/0]).       %% not okay since t/0 is exported
 4762:              -removed([{t,'_'}]).   %% not okay since t/0 is exported
 4763:              -removed([{'_','_'}]). %% not okay since t/0 is exported
 4764:              -removed([{{badly,formed},1}]).
 4765:              -removed('badly formed').
 4766:              -export([t/0]).
 4767:              frutt() -> ok.
 4768:              t() -> ok.
 4769:             ">>,
 4770:            {[]},

 4772:                    {{4,15},erl_lint,{bad_removed,{t,'_'}}},
 4773:                    {{5,15},erl_lint,{bad_removed,{'_','_'}}},
 4774:                    {{6,15},erl_lint,{invalid_removed,{{badly,formed},1}}},
 4775:                    {{7,15},erl_lint,{invalid_removed,'badly formed'}}],
 4776:                    [{{9,14},erl_lint,{unused_function,{frutt,0}}}]}}
 4777:          ],

 4781: otp_16516(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4782:     one_multi_init(Config),

 4784: 
 4785: one_multi_init(Config) ->
 4786:     "'_' initializes no omitted fields" =
 4787:         format_error(bad_multi_field_init),
 4788:     Ts = [{otp_16516_1,
 4789:            <<"-record(r, {f}).
 4790:               t(#r{f = 17, _ = V}) ->
 4791:                   V.
 4792:               u(#r{_ = V, f = 17}) ->
 4793:                   V.
 4794:               -record(r1, {f, g = 17}).
 4795:               g(#r1{f = 3, _ = 42}) ->
 4796:                 g.
 4797:              ">>,
 4798:            [],
 4799:            {errors,[{{2,28},erl_lint,bad_multi_field_init},
 4800:                     {{4,20},erl_lint,bad_multi_field_init}],[]}},
 4801:           {otp_16516_2,
 4802:            %% No error since "_ = '_'" is actually used as a catch-all
 4803:            %% initialization. V is unused (as compilation with the 'E'
 4804:            %% option shows), but no warning about V being unused is
 4805:            %% output.
 4806:            <<"-record(r, {f}).
 4807:               t(V) ->
 4808:                   #r{f = 3, _ = V}.
 4809:               u(V) ->
 4810:                   #r{_ = V, f = 3}.
 4811:              ">>,
 4812:            [],
 4813:            []},
 4814:           {otp_16516_3,
 4815:            %% No error in this case either. And no unused variable warning.
 4816:            <<"-record(r, {f}).
 4817:               t(V) when #r{f = 3, _ = V} =:= #r{f = 3} ->
 4818:                   a.
 4819:               u(V) when #r{_ = V, f = 3} =:= #r{f = 3} ->
 4820:                   a.
 4821:              ">>,
 4822:            [],
 4823:            []}],
 4824:     [] = run(Config, Ts).
 4825:

 5024:                                 end,
