 5334:                   io:format(\"~kW\n\", [Map,5]),
 5335:                   io:format(\"~tkp\n\", [Map]),
 5336:                   io:format(\"~klp\n\", [Map]),
 5337:                   RevCmpFun = fun erlang:'>='/2,
 5338:                   io:format(\"~Kp\n\", [RevCmpFun,Map]),
 5339:                   io:format(\"~KP\n\", [RevCmpFun,Map,10]),
 5340:                   io:format(\"~Kw\n\", [RevCmpFun,Map]),
 5341:                   io:format(\"~KW\n\", [RevCmpFun,Map,5]),
 5342:                   ok.">>,
 5343:            [],
 5344:            []},
 5345:           {tilde_k_2,
 5346:            <<"t(Map) ->
 5347:                   io:format(\"~kkp\n\", [Map]),
 5348:                   io:format(\"~kKp\n\", [Map]),
 5349:                   io:format(\"~ks\n\", [Map]),
 5350:                   ok.">>,
 5351:            [],
 5352:            {warnings,
 5353:             [{{2,29},
 5354:               erl_lint,
 5355:               {format_error,{"format string invalid (~ts)",
 5356:                              ["repeated modifier k"]}}},
 5357:              {{4,29},
 5358:               erl_lint,
 5359:               {format_error,{"format string invalid (~ts)",
 5360:                              ["conflicting modifiers ~Kkp"]}}},
 5361:              {{6,29},
 5362:               erl_lint,
 5363:               {format_error,{"format string invalid (~ts)",
 5364:                              ["invalid modifier/control combination ~ks"]}}}]}
 5365:           }
 5366:          ],
 5367:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 5368: 
 5369:     ok.
 5370: 
 5371: match_float_zero(Config) ->
 5372:     Ts = [{float_zero_1,
 5373:            <<"t(+0.0) -> ok.\n"
 5374:              "k(-0.0) -> ok.\n">>,
 5375:            [],
 5376:            []},
 5377:           {float_zero_2,
 5378:            <<"t(0.0) -> ok.\n"
 5379:              "k({0.0}) -> ok.\n">>,
 5380:            [],
 5381:            {warnings,[{{1,23},erl_lint,match_float_zero},
 5382:                       {{2,4},erl_lint,match_float_zero}]}},
 5383:           {float_zero_3,
 5384:            <<"t(A) when A =:= 0.0 -> ok;\n" %% Should warn.
 5385:              "t(A) when A =:= {0.0} -> ok.\n" %% Should warn.
 5386:              "k(A) -> A =:= 0.0.\n" %% Should warn.
 5387:              "q(A) -> A =:= {0.0}.\n" %% Should warn.
 5388:              "z(A) when A =:= +0.0 -> ok;\n" %% Should not warn.
 5389:              "z(A) when A =:= {+0.0} -> ok.\n">>, %% Should not warn.
 5390:            [],
 5391:            {warnings,[{{1,37},erl_lint,match_float_zero},
 5392:                       {{2,18},erl_lint,match_float_zero},
 5393:                       {{3,15},erl_lint,match_float_zero},
 5394:                       {{4,16},erl_lint,match_float_zero}]}}
 5395:          ],
 5396:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 5397: 
 5398:     ok.
 5399: 
 5400: %% GH-7655. When the module definition was missing, spurious
 5401: %% diagnostics would be emitted for each spec.
 5402: undefined_module(Config) ->
 5403:     Code = <<"-spec foo() -> 'ok'.
 5404:               foo() -> ok.
 5405:              ">>,
 5406:     {errors,[{{1,2},erl_lint,undefined_module}],[]} = run_test2(Config, Code, []),
 5407: 
 5408:     ok.
 5409: 
 5410: update_literal(Config) ->
 5411:     Ts = [{update_record_literal,
 5412:            <<"-record(a, {b}).
 5413:              t() -> #a{}#a{}#a{b=aoeu}.
 5414:              k() -> A = #a{}, A#a{}#a{b=aoeu}.">>,
 5415:            [],
 5416:            {warnings,[{{2,25},erl_lint,update_literal},
 5417:                       {{2,29},erl_lint,update_literal}]}},
 5418:           {update_map_literal_assoc,
 5419:            <<"t() -> #{}#{}#{b=>aoeu}.
 5420:               k() -> A = #{}, A#{}#{b=>aoeu}.">>,
 5421:            [],
 5422:            {warnings,[{{1,31},erl_lint,update_literal},
 5423:                       {{1,34},erl_lint,update_literal}]}},
 5424:           {update_map_literal_exact,
 5425:            <<"t() -> #{}#{}#{b:=aoeu}.
 5426:               k() -> A = #{}, A#{}#{b:=aoeu}.">>,
 5427:            [],
 5428:            {warnings,[{{1,31},erl_lint,update_literal},
 5429:                       {{1,34},erl_lint,update_literal}]}}
 5430:          ],
 5431:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 5432: 
 5433:     ok.
 5434: 
 5435: %% For certain kinds of errors that are easily caused by typos, error 
 5436: %% messages try to suggest fixes according to jaro_similarity.
 5437: messages_with_jaro_suggestions(Config) ->
 5438:     Ts = [{on_load_fun,
 5439:            <<"-on_load(foa/0).
 5440:               foo() -> ok.">>,
 5441:            {[]},
 5442:            {error,[{{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_on_load,{foa,0},"foo"}}],
 5443:             [{{2,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{foo,0}}}]}},
 5444:           {undefined_nif,
 5445:            <<"-export([foo/1,bar/2]).
 5446:               -nifs([foa/1,bar/1]).
 5447:               -on_load(init/0).
 5448:               init() ->
 5449:                   ok = erlang:load_nif(\"./example_nif\", 0).
 5450:               foo(_X) ->
 5451:                   erlang:nif_error(nif_library_not_loaded).
 5452:               bar(_X,_Y) ->
 5453:                   erlang:nif_error(nif_library_not_loaded).">>,
 5454:            {[]},
 5455:            {errors,[{{2,16},erl_lint,{undefined_nif,{bar,1},{bar,[2]}}},
 5456:                     {{2,16},erl_lint,{undefined_nif,{foa,1},{"foo",1}}}],[]}},
 5457:           {record_and_field,
 5458:            <<"-record(meep, { moo, muu }).
 5459:               t(State) ->
 5460:                   Var = State#meep.mo,
 5461:                   State#mee{ moo = Var }.">>,
 5462:            {[]},
 5463:            {error,[{{3,36},erl_lint,{undefined_field,meep,mo,"moo"}},
 5464:                    {{4,24},erl_lint,{undefined_record,mee,"meep"}}],
 5465:             [{{2,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{t,1}}},
 5466:              {{3,19},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Var'}}]}},
 5467:           {unbound_var,
 5468:            <<"-record(meep, { moo, muu }).
 5469:               t(State) ->
 5470:                   Var = State#meep.moo,
 5471:                   Stat#meep{ moo = Var }.">>,
 5472:            {[]},
 5473:            {error,[{{4,19},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'Stat',"State"}}],
 5474:             [{{2,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{t,1}}}]}},
 5475:           {undefined_fun,
 5476:            <<"-export([bar/1,foo/2]).
 5477:               baz(X) -> X.
 5478:               foo(X) -> X.
 5479:               foo(X, Y, Z) -> X + Y + Z.">>,
 5480:            {[]},
 5481:            {error,[{{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_function,{bar,1},{"baz",1}}},
 5482:                    {{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_function,{foo,2},{foo,[1,3]}}}],
 5483:                   [{{2,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{baz,1}}},
 5484:                    {{3,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{foo,1}}},
 5485:                    {{4,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{foo,3}}}]}},
 5486:           {nowarn_undefined_fun,
 5487:            <<"-compile({nowarn_unused_function,[{an_not_used,1}]}).
 5488:               and_not_used(_) -> foo.">>,
 5489:            {[]},
 5490:            {error,[{{1,22}, erl_lint,
 5491:                     {bad_nowarn_unused_function,{an_not_used,1},{"and_not_used",1}}}],
 5492:             [{{2,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{and_not_used,1}}}]}},
 5493:           {bad_inline,
 5494:            <<"-compile({inline, [{foo,1},{ba,1}]}).
 5495:               foa(A) -> {A}.
 5496:               ba(A, A) -> [A].">>,
 5497:            {[]},
 5498:            {error,[{{1,22},erl_lint,{bad_inline,{ba,1},{ba,[2]}}},
 5499:                    {{1,22},erl_lint,{bad_inline,{foo,1},{"foa",1}}}],
 5500:                   [{{2,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{foa,1}}},
 5501:                    {{3,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{ba,2}}}]}},
 5502:           {bad_dialyzer_attribute,
 5503:             <<"-dialyzer({nowarn_function,[foo/2,bar/1]}).
 5504:                 foo(X, Y, Z) -> X + Y + Z.
 5505:                 baz(A) -> A.">>,
 5506:             {[]},
 5507:             {error,[{{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_function,{bar,1},{"baz",1}}},
 5508:                     {{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_function,{foo,2},{foo,[3]}}}],
 5509:                    [{{2,17},erl_lint,{unused_function,{foo,3}}},
 5510:                     {{3,17},erl_lint,{unused_function,{baz,1}}}]}}
 5511:          ],
 5512:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 5513: 
 5514:     ok.
 5515: 
 5516: illegal_zip_generator(Config) ->
 5517:     Ts = [{not_generator,
 5518:            <<"-compile({nowarn_unused_function,[{foo,0}]}).
 5519:             foo() -> [X + Y || X <- [1,2,3,4] && Y <- [5,6,7] && X > 1].
 5520:             ">>,
 5521:            {[]},
 5522:            {errors,[{{2,68},erl_lint,illegal_zip_generator}],[]}},
 5523:            {not_generator,
 5524:            <<"-compile({nowarn_unused_function,[{bar,0}]}).
 5525:             bar() -> [X + Y || X <- [[1,2],[3,4]] && lists:sum(X) > 0 && Y <- [5,6,7]].
 5526:             ">>,
 5527:            {[]},
 5528:            {errors,[{{2,67},erl_lint,illegal_zip_generator}],[]}}
 5529:            ],
 5530:     [] = run(Config,Ts),
 5531: 
 5532:     ok.
 5533: 
 5534: %%%
 5535: %%% Common utilities.
 5536: %%%
 5537: 
 5538: rewrite([{Name,Code,[],{warnings,_}}=H|T], Subst) ->
 5539:     case Subst of
 5540:         #{Name := Opts} ->
 5541:             io:format("~s: testing with options ~p\n", [Name,Opts]),
 5542:             [{Name,Code,Opts,[]}|rewrite(T, Subst)];
 5543:         #{} ->
 5544:             [H|rewrite(T, Subst)]
 5545:     end;
 5546: rewrite([H|T], Subst) ->
 5547:     [H|rewrite(T, Subst)];
 5548: rewrite([], _Subst) ->
 5549:     [].
 5550: 
 5551: format_error(E) ->
 5552:     lists:flatten(erl_lint:format_error(E)).
 5553: 
 5554: run(Config, Tests) ->
 5555:     F = fun({N,P,Ws,E}, BadL) ->
 5556:                 io:format("### ~s\n", [N]),
 5557:                 case catch run_test(Config, P, Ws) of
 5558:                     E -> 
 5559:                         BadL;
 5560:                     Bad -> 
 5561:                         io:format("~nTest ~p failed. Expected~n  ~p~n"
 5562:                                   "but got~n  ~p~n", [N, E, Bad]),
 5563: 			fail()
 5564:                 end
 5565:         end,
 5566:     lists:foldl(F, [], Tests).
 5567: 
 5568: %% Compiles a test file and returns the list of warnings/errors.
 5569: 
 5570: get_compilation_result(Conf, Filename, Warnings) ->
 5571:     DataDir = ?datadir,
 5572:     File = filename:join(DataDir, Filename),
 5573:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(File++".erl"),
 5574:     FileS = binary_to_list(Bin),
 5575:     {match,[{Start,Length}|_]} = re:run(FileS, "-module.*\\n"),
 5576:     Test = lists:nthtail(Start+Length, FileS),
 5577:     case run_test(Conf, Test, Warnings) of
 5578:         {warnings, Ws} -> Ws;
 5579:         {errors,Es,Ws} -> {Es,Ws};
 5580:         [] -> []
 5581:     end.
 5582: 
 5583: %% Compiles a test module and returns the list of errors and warnings.
 5584: 
 5585: run_test(Conf, Test0, Warnings0) ->
 5586:     Test = list_to_binary(["-module(lint_test). ", Test0]),
 5587:     run_test2(Conf, Test, Warnings0).
 5588: 
 5589: run_test2(Conf, Test, Warnings0) ->
 5590:     Filename = "lint_test.erl",
 5591:     DataDir = ?privdir,
 5592:     File = filename:join(DataDir, Filename),
 5593:     Opts = case Warnings0 of
 5594:                {Warnings} ->		%Hairy trick to not add export_all.
 5595:                    [return|Warnings];
 5596:                Warnings ->
 5597:                    [export_all,return|Warnings]
 5598:            end,
 5599:     ok = file:write_file(File, Test),
 5600: 
 5601:     %% We will use the 'binary' option so that the compiler will not
 5602:     %% compare the module name to the output file name. Also, there
 5603:     %% is no reason to produce an output file since we are only
 5604:     %% interested in the errors and warnings.
 5605: 
 5606:     %% Print warnings, call erl_lint:format_error/1. (But note that
 5607:     %% the compiler will ignore failing calls to erl_lint:format_error/1.)
 5608:     compile:file(File, [binary,report|Opts]),
 5609: 
 5610:     case compile:file(File, [binary|Opts]) of
 5611:         {ok, _M, Code, Ws} when is_binary(Code) ->
 5612:             warnings(File, Ws, Test);
 5613:         {error, [{File,Es}], []} ->
 5614:             print_diagnostics(Es, Test),
 5615: 	    {errors, call_format_error(Es), []};
 5616:         {error, [{File,Es}], [{File,Ws}]} ->
 5617:             print_diagnostics(Es, Test),
 5618:             print_diagnostics(Ws, Test),
 5619: 	    {error, call_format_error(Es), call_format_error(Ws)};
 5620:         {error, [{File,Es1},{File,Es2}], []} ->
 5621:             print_diagnostics(Es1, Test),
 5622:             print_diagnostics(Es2, Test),
 5623: 	    {errors2, Es1, Es2}
 5624:     end.
 5625: 
 5626: warnings(File, Ws, Source) ->
 5627:     case lists:append([W || {F, W} <- Ws, F =:= File]) of
 5628:         [] ->
 5629: 	    [];
 5630:         L ->
 5631:             print_diagnostics(L, Source),
 5632: 	    {warnings, call_format_error(L)}
 5633:     end.
 5634: 
 5635: call_format_error(L) ->
 5636:     %% Smoke test of format_error/1 to make sure that no crashes
 5637:     %% slip through.
 5638:     _ = [Mod:format_error(Term) || {_,Mod,Term} <- L],
 5639:     L.
 5640: 
 5641: print_diagnostics(Warnings, Source) ->
 5642:     case binary:match(Source, <<"-file(">>) of
 5643:         nomatch ->
 5644:             Lines = binary:split(Source, <<"\n">>, [global]),
 5645:             Cs = [print_diagnostic(W, Lines) || W <- Warnings],
 5646:             io:put_chars(Cs);
 5647:         _ ->
 5648:             %% There are probably fake line numbers greater than
 5649:             %% the number of actual lines.
 5650:             ok
 5651:     end.
 5652: 
 5653: print_diagnostic({{LineNum,Column},Mod,Data}, Lines) ->
 5654:     Line0 = lists:nth(LineNum, Lines),
 5655:     <<Line1:(Column-1)/binary,_/binary>> = Line0,
 5656:     Spaces = re:replace(Line1, <<"[^\t]">>, <<" ">>, [global]),
 5657:     CaretLine = [Spaces,"^"],
 5658:     [io_lib:format("~p:~p: ~ts\n", [LineNum,Column,Mod:format_error(Data)]),
 5659:      Line0, "\n",
 5660:      CaretLine, "\n\n"];
 5661: print_diagnostic(_, _) ->
 5662:     [].
 5663: 
 5664: fail() ->
 5665:     ct:fail(failed).
